text: My daughter has shown significant improvement in her Chinese since joining Lu Laoshi in P5 and got an AL3 in PSLE. Taking Chinese was hard for her as she is not a native Chinese and nobody at home could speak to her in Mandarin. However, a very experienced Lu Laoshi helped her overcome this using her highly effective teaching methods. Moreover, her lessons are interactive and fun and my daughter thoroughly enjoy her lessons. Very grateful to Lu Laoshi for her constant support and guidance!

Lulaoshi is a great Chinese teacher. She is very attentive and cares for my daughter. She also provides a lot of self prepared materials for students. Her teaching style motivates my daughter to achieve her goal. With her guidance, my daughter scored AL2 in PSLE! Thank you so much, Lulaoshi ðŸ’“!

Lu laoshi is a dedicated tutor. She prepares her own materials and stretches my childâ€™s potential. Although this is a group tuition, my child has never felt neglected. Lu laoshi is still able to give my child the attention thst she needs. Thank you Lu laoshi! I would highly recommend her if you are thinking of getting a chinese tutor for your child.

Our daughter has been with My Lulaoshi since P4 till now in Sec2 in 2023. She has targetted focus on the lessons and the small group allows her to track progress on an individual basis including doing corrections! Have recommended 2 other parents to get their kid to join her classes as well!

My daughter enjoyed the class and she has also learnt a lot from it.  Lulaoshi provided breaks if needed by giving refreshments to help them stay attentive and focused. She also uses positive reinforcement which I think can be fun and encouraging for the students. We thank Lulaoshi for her dedication in helping my daughter to improve in her Chinese.
